subject: A thought pick up?
author: Frank Sumption
full_text:
------=_NextPart_000_1e9e_26a2_79c2
Content-Type: text/plain; format=flowed

I was working with #12 cuz now it's all distorted, I think, or maybe it's 
just cuz the new tuner is more better? I got this on random-AM mode tonight. 
Just what I was thinking, but I would not have said it in this manor, with 
the rythum in this voice.

The box works, but it's distorted.

Frasnk-S
